channel.title: Viserion | SPAWN | Hyperion | Summoning | All skills | Duel Arena | Mini-Games |
channel.description:
[CENTER]Viserion has All Skills working, this includes Hunter, Summoning and Farming. Duel Arena Clan Chats Minigames Curse Prayers EP Drops Perfect Special Attacks Dicing Excellent Pking. I have already bought a dedicated host server and tested 100-150 players with 0 lag.
This server is based from hyperion and it has been a 2 year project I have been told from the Previous developers. I am still looking for excelent website developers and client developers. And I am planning to fully release on November the 24th. I have a team of 10 players / friends / people who would like to test the server before the full release. If you want to be part of that team then hit me up with your skype, and yes you will get rewarded for testing. [/CENTER]
[CENTER]Team Me, Carlo Gambino, Head of the project plasticboy, Recently helping me with website - Looking for GFX/Logo/Photoshop maker - Looking for Developers in any kind of help[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Media[/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://eypic.net/images/13spking.png[/img]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gvHWefq.png[/img][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://s8.postimg.org/ma1s0jxgl/Screen_shot_2014_04_04_at_4_53_52_PM.png[/img][/CENTER]
